articles.title: Kim Jong Il Greets Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Greets Syrian President
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Bashar Al-Assad, President of Syria who doubles as regional secretary of the Arab Baath Socialist Party, on the occasion of the 39th anniversary of the corrective movement in Syria.
					 The message said:
					
					 The corrective movement marked a historic event of landmark significance in the efforts of the Syrian people to build an independent, prosperous new society.
					
					 I, availing myself of this opportunity, sincerely wish you fresh success in your work to defend the sovereignty of the country and achieve fair and comprehensive peace in the Mideast and the friendly Syrian people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Syrian President
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Bashar Al-Assad, President of Syria who doubles as regional secretary of the Arab Baath Socialist Party, on the occasion of the 39th anniversary of the corrective movement in Syria.
					 Kim Yong Nam in the message noted that the Syrian people could protect the sovereignty of the country and the national dignity and achieve social progress and prosperity thanks to the corrective movement carried out under the leadership of Hafez Al-Assad, the leader of advance.
					
					 Expressing the belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message hoped that the Syrian people would register success in the work to accelerate the modernization of the country and seek a fair and comprehensive solution to the Mideast issue under the correct leadership of the Arab Baath Socialist Party headed by the President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Leadership over Cause of Independence Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Leadership over Cause of Independence Lauded
 Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- History knows no such strategist and supreme commander as Kim Jong Il who has led the confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialists to victory, making undying contributions to the human cause of independence, the cause of peace with rare wisdom and far-sightedness, steel-strong pluck and guts and outstanding strategy and commanding art, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a signed article.
					 The greatness of Kim Jong Il as supreme commander on the world anti-imperialist front finds its vivid manifestation in the historic course in which he advanced a great idea and correct strategy and tactics, powerfully encouraging  the world revolutionary people in their  struggle against imperialism, and has foiled the imperialist reactionaries' anti-DPRK offensive and firmly protected peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world by pursuing unique Songun politics, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il's great idea on independence against imperialism and outstanding strategy and tactics the anti-imperialist independent forces have grown stronger while the imperialist hegemonic forces have become considerably weaker amid the fierce struggle between the revolutionary forces and the counter-revolutionary forces and between the anti-imperialist independence forces and the imperialist hegemonic forces on the international arena.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's great idea on independence against imperialism is triumphing in the world today.
					
					The DPRK has remarkably raised its international prestige and national dignity while resolutely foiling the ever more undisguised anti-DPRK moves on the part of the imperialist allied forces. This would be unthinkable without the outstanding leadership of illustrious commander born of Heaven
						 Kim Jong Il who has built the invincible revolutionary armed forces by clarifying the philosophy on arms that a revolution is started with arms and brought to completion with arms and attaching importance to the army and the military affairs.
					
					 Today the progressive people ardently revere and follow Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the world anti-imperialist front in the present times because he has provided brilliant leadership over the human cause of independence, regarding it as his lifetime goal and mission to accomplish it.
					
					 Progressive mankind confidently sees a rosy future and victory of the cause of independence in the 21st century in the great personality of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It is its unshakable conviction that the cause of independence against imperialism is sure to triumph as long as it is led by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Czech
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Czech
Pyongyang, November 15 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the exploits of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk took place in the Czech Republic on November 5 to mark the 18th anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 92nd anniversary of her birth.
					 Displayed in the venue of the seminar were Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" and photos showing the achievements made by the Korean people in building a thriving nation.
					
					 Present there were members of the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea and the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and other people.
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to the country and his embassy officials were present there on invitation.
					
					 Honorary Chairman of the association Jiri Jarka said that Kim Jong Il made long and tiresome journeys to visit wherever there are servicepersons to learn in detail about their living, health and tidings from their hometowns, etc.
					
					 Thanks to his ceaseless on-the-spot inspection the KPA has grown to be a strong army with invincible might, he stressed.
					
					The DPRK's successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 and the second nuclear test this year proved that the Korean people never say empty words but have a firm will, he noted, expressing conviction that the army and people of the DPRK will win only victories under the leadership of
						 Kim Jong Il.
